<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get SNS Name Info</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/sns/names/{nameOrInscriptionId}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get SNS name info by name or inscription ID.



<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
